description: Retrieves a subset of information about the classification scope for an account.

nested_items.name: classificationScopes
nested_items.description: An array that specifies the unique identifier and name of the classification scope for the account.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the classification scope.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the classification scope: automated-sensitive-data-discovery.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
